metadata.title: CVE-2016-6265 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the pdf_load_xref function in pdf/pdf-xref.c in MuPDF allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9a+ds1-1.1').
